title: Mr. & Mrs. Edgehill
brief_description: Lady Cynthia is a woman of wealth and position, but she is touched and amazed by the love and devotion of Mr and Mrs Edgehill feel for one another. What is it that makes this ordinary couple so content with their life - even on a remote and desolate South sea Island? The screen play is written by T R Bowen, from the original work by Noel Coward. Rated: G
